Note: Signed "John W. Sheeres." Date based on America's participation in the war. "A.Q.O. 203-8-5-19-25M." and "3-7009," appear on the bottom left of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to join the Quarter Master Corps for your future success and be a business soldier in the United States Army. Illustration shows Uncle Sam in an army uniform smiling and pointing to the stars in the sky.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
